hotels.title: Oceanfront Kauai Resort with Hawaii's Largest Single-Level Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Discover a Hawaiian paradise on the beautiful island of Kauai at the oceanfront Royal Sonesta Kauai Resort Lihue. A world away from the skyscrapers of Waikiki, this peaceful property sits just steps from Kalapaki Beach. You'll be spoiled by the hotel's long list of luxe facilities, including four onsite restaurants. Head to Kukui’s on Kalapaki Beach for culinary delights served poolside, start your morning with a hot coffee and freshly-baked pastry from Aupaka Terrace or dig into authentic Hawaiin cuisine while soaking in breathtaking ocean views at Duke’s Kauai. The jewel in the hotel's crown? A glorious pool - the largest single-level outdoor pool in Hawaii. When you’re not lounging by the shimmering water, head to Kalapaki Beach, where you can sunbathe on the sand or take a dip in the turquoise waters. Stay on top of your fitness game at the onsite fitness centre or indulge in total relaxation with a trip to Alexandar Day Spa and Salon.

hotels.title: Laidback Kauai Oceanfront Luxury with Three Restaurants & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Treat yourself to quintessential laidback luxury on Kauai island's eastern coast. This tropical paradise offers direct access to the pristine sands of Nukolii Beach, while the resort's spa invites relaxation with traditional Hawaiian treatments. Savour island-inspired cuisine at the three onsite restaurants, or explore the nearby Wailua River, famed for its kayaking and paddleboarding.
